wipe_door_frame.description: Wipe the door frame to remove dust.

press_on_door_frame.description: Press on the door frame to test the rigidity.

general_clean_frame.description: Clean the door frame to get rid of any dust.

press_the_door_frame.description: Apply pressure on the door frame.

shutdown_rotation_door.description: Rotate the open door to close it down.

close_using_flap_action.description: Close the opened door using a flap action.

clean_open_door.description: Clean the opened door to remove any dust or dirt.

general_close_door.description: Swing the door to close it.

swipe_rotation_door.description: Swipe open the rotation door all the way.

rotate_rotation_door.description: Rotate the rotation door into a certain position.

wipe_rotation_door.description: Wipe the rotation door to clean it.

open_rotate_door.description: Open the closed door by rotating it around the hinge.

open_using_flap_action.description: Open the closed door using a flap action.

clean_closed_door.description: Clean the entirety of the closed door.

general_open_door.description: Swing the door to open it.

press_closed_rotation_door.description: Apply pressure on the closed rotation door.

swap_rotation_door.description: Switch the position of the rotation door.

wipe_rotation_door.description: Wipe the rotation door to clean it.

clean_all_surfaces.description: Clean all surfaces of the doors and frames.

press_all_parts.description: Press on all parts of the doors and frames to test the rigidity.

rotate_all_open_doors.description: Rotate all opened rotation doors to a closed status.

rotate_all_closed_doors.description: Rotate all closed rotation doors to an opened status.

general_clean_door_and_frame.description: Clean the door frame along with the door whether it is opened or closed.

clean_door.description: Clean the entire door, including the frame and door leaves.

clean_formula_d.description: Clean every surface of door, including frame and door plates.
